Description: Do nothing in this cell
Change execution direction to go left
Change execution direction to go right
Change execution direction to go up
Change execution direction to go down
Add value in accumulator with current cell and write back into accumulator
Subtract current memory cell value from accumulator and write back into accumulator
Multiply value in accumulator by current memory cell and write back into accumulator
Divide value in accumulator by current memory cell and write back into accumulator
Add 1 to accumulator
Subtract 1 from accumulator
Sets flag to true if accumulator is less than current memory cell value
Sets flag to true if accumulator is more than current memory cell value
Change execution direction to go left if flag is true
Change execution direction to go right if flag is true
Change execution direction to go up if flag is true
Change execution direction to go down if flag is true
Sets flag to true if accumulator is less or equal to current memory cell value
Sets flag to true if accumulator is more or equal to current memory cell value
Sets flag to true if accumulator equal to current memory cell value
Sets flag to true if accumulator is not or equal to current memory cell value
Select next memory cell value
Select previous memory cell value
Write from accumulator to current memory cell
Write from current memory cell to accumulator
Write value in the accumulator to the output
Ends the execution
Set condition flag to true if accumulator is zero
